name: Tower of Slings (Pine Pitch Games)
description:
Tower of Slings is a game about flinging a ball to the top of a tower, Can you light the torch on top? Build up score multipliers and beat your high score! 

By supporting this Pinecone game you are helping kick start our studio and help us produce more games! 

Please consider supporting us on Patreon! to get all our new releases for free! Also, join our Discord!

Thank you and enjoy the tower!
